message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I'm not willing to go above $15,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective.  How about we meet halfway between our offers at $13,250?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to go down to $13,000? I'm willing to make a final offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
